thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Linda Dutrumble
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Linda Dutrumble

author: Linda Dutrumble
title: Linda Dutrumble
text: Aaron Vanecek planned the perfect experience for us. We were amazed at the attention to every little detail. The transportation was always on time and knew exactly what we were doing each day. They made us very comfortable, offering snacks, drinks, checking in with us as to the temperature in the van, making pit stops, and pointing out interesting things we might want to know as we passed. The hotels were chosen with fun and comfort in mind. The excursions were planned in a manner that we felt fit our pace and ability. We had plenty of time to relax and enjoy. I would highly recommend this company for a worry free vacation.
